instructions: Thaw the seafood under cold water by wrapping in cheesecloth, placing on a paper towel in between applications
Place the seafood in a freezer bag and press out excess air
In a saucepan over low heat, combine the sauce ingredients
Bring to boil
Pour over your seafood in the freezer bag and seal, placing the top one corner facing out
Freeze seafood according to the manufacturer's instructions
Remove the seafood from the freezer, drain of any oil and discard the clams
Place a heat proof paper covered frying pan over the stove and cook the seafood for 6 8 minutes, until the meat turns opaque
frozen-seafood-in-clam-sauce.title: Frozen Seafood in Clam Sauce
frozen-seafood-in-clam-sauce.gist: Indulge in a rich and savory seafood delight with tender clams and a creamy sauce, perfect for a luxurious dinner.

ingredients: 1/4 bulb, roasted sliced bell pepper, cut into thin strips and kept separate
1 red grapes or 1 golden seedless grapes, halved lengthwise
1 cup gruyere or 1 cup swiss cheese
instructions: Brush a 13 x 9 x 2 inch glass baking dish with melted butter or margarine
Spread roasted bell pepper strips over the bottom of the dish in a spiral
Arrange the sliced bananas over the peppers
Scatter the gruyere over the bananas
Spread grape seeds over the cheese
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 8 24 hours
Let stand at room temperature for 30 45 minutes before serving
french-revolution-bread.title: French Revolution Bread
french-revolution-bread.gist: A unique blend of roasted peppers, bananas, and cheese, this bread is a revolutionary twist on traditional flavors.

instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions
When pasta is tender, drain and set aside
In a food processor or blender, combine mint, celery leaves, and vanilla and process until smooth
Add to pasta and toss to coat
Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate for up to two days
pasta-with-fettuccine.title: Pasta With Fettuccine
pasta-with-fettuccine.gist: A refreshing pasta dish infused with mint and cardamom, offering a burst of flavor in every bite.

ingredients: 6 cups iceberg lettuce, chopped ( any of your favorite )
1 package frozen mixed vegetables ( like potato sticks or peas )
1 cup monterey jack pepper cheese, shredded
instructions: Boil 6 cups water
Add 2 tbsp salt&#241
strawberry-salad.title: Strawberry Salad
strawberry-salad.gist: A vibrant salad combining sweet strawberries and crisp lettuce, topped with a hint of turmeric for a unique twist.

ingredients: 3 garlic cloves, chopped or pressed ( for garlic lovers )
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a small saucepan and cover with a lid
Cook over medium heat just until heated through, about 15 minutes
Note, use about half the amount of feta you are planning on using
Some have even used other feta cheese
homemade-feta.title: Homemade Feta
homemade-feta.gist: Craft your own creamy and tangy feta cheese at home with simple ingredients and a burst of garlic flavor.

ingredients: 1 lb leeksvar greens or 1 lb spinach
instructions: Put together chopped garlic, miso and spinach
Cook in microwave for 1/2 minute
Let cool and then put into refigerator to chill
Serve cold or room temperature
lekvar.title: Lekvar
lekvar.gist: A savory blend of miso, garlic, and greens, perfect as a chilled spread or dip for any occasion.

instructions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water
Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat
Cover eggs with cold water
Place pan over high heat until water is very bubbly, then remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature
Carefully crack eggs and place in a bowl of cold water to harden
Chop the eggs coarsely and transfer to a non metallic bowl
Stir in miso, garlic, truffle, and salt
truffled-eggs.title: Truffled Eggs
truffled-eggs.gist: Elevate your breakfast with these luxurious truffled eggs, infused with the rich flavors of miso and garlic.

instructions: Put the egg and half the sugar in a blender
Bloom on high till mixture is light and frothy
Add the garlic a little at a time and blend till fine
When ready to use stir in remaining sugar
Enjoy
alfredo-sauce.title: Alfredo Sauce
alfredo-sauce.gist: A creamy and sweet Alfredo sauce with a hint of garlic, perfect for drizzling over your favorite dishes.

instructions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees
Break eggs into a large bowl and blend well
Add sugar, garlic and garlic and mix to combine completely
Add salt to taste
Add about a teaspoon full of oil or melted margarine to fry pan
If the mixture is too dry, add a bit of milk
Heat pan until it gets dry, then reduce heat to low
Add egg mixture and mix well while its bubbling

You can also scramble the eggs by dropping them into a colander at the last minute then they can be turned and fried until golden brown, but less likely to over cook the whites as they cook in the oven
Drain on paper towels and serve
garlic-crust-eggs.title: Garlic Crust Eggs
garlic-crust-eggs.gist: A unique egg dish with a sweet and garlicky crust, offering a delightful contrast of flavors in every bite.

instructions: The easiest way to prepare sea scallop is to slice through it on the top but not cutting right through
This is much easier if you do this
If not cutting through it you can use scissors or the cut side of the scallops
This works better than cutting the scallops in half horizontally as you will have the scallops standing up in a flat surface
This will result in good scallop shape
When you are ready to eat, dunk them into a bowl of salted boiling water and immediately plunge as many as you are ready for into the salted water
They will sink to the bottom, so make sure they are thoroughly prepared
You can also steam them in the same pan you cooked them inches
They will be ready when they curl back around in the center
Drain well and then serve warm or cold
sea-scallops.title: Sea Scallops
sea-scallops.gist: Perfectly prepared sea scallops, tender and flavorful, ideal for a gourmet seafood experience.

instructions: Place all the ingredients into a slow cooker
If using a crockpot, heat for 15 60 minutes on high, stirring once halfway through cooking time to ensure the mixture doesn't dry out
When cooked serve immediately
Alternatively keep in a bowl in the fridge and use as is
salsa-verde-(salsa-verde).title: Salsa Verde (Salsa Verde)
salsa-verde-(salsa-verde).gist: A zesty and vibrant salsa verde, perfect for adding a fresh and tangy touch to any dish.

instructions: Cut or tear crabmeat into small pieces
Melt butter in a large sauté pan over medium heat
Fry crab meat until golden brown
crab-with-cream-for-one.title: Crab With Cream for One
crab-with-cream-for-one.gist: A decadent crab dish, rich with butter and cream, perfect for a luxurious solo dining experience.

instructions: Beat together the 5 eggs and the milk with a little salt
Stir in a teaspoon of salt
Beat the egg whites until they are stiff and fold them into the mixture
Put mixture into a buttered 20 x 30 cm pan and bake at 180º c for 45 minutes, or until golden brown
Serve hot with slices of toast, buttered cabbage or potatoes and lettuce
cheese-mixture.title: Cheese Mixture
cheese-mixture.gist: A fluffy and cheesy baked delight, perfect for breakfast or as a side dish with your favorite greens.

instructions: Soak millet in sufficient water for about 1 hour
Drain well and mash with a potato masher
Heat a small sauté pan, pour in half the milled millet
Stir fry for 1 minute, then stir in the chopped onion and green chillies
Sauté for 5 minutes or till the onion has turned lightly brown
Stir in the remaining millet
Stir the ground coconut, poppy seeds and salt
Stir well, then add the shredded coconut
Serve hot with chapatis or raita
mixed-vegetables.title: Mixed Vegetables
mixed-vegetables.gist: A hearty mix of millet, coconut, and spices, this dish is a flavorful vegetarian treat best enjoyed with chapatis or raita.

ingredients: 2 large sweet onions, thinly sliced and cut into half-inch pieces or 2 large red onions, cut into half-inch pieces
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a serving bowl, stirring as it sits while you prepare the rest of the ingredients
Cover and set aside at room temperature for at least 30 minutes to allow flavors to develop
sweet-onion-salad-dressing.title: Sweet Onion Salad Dressing
sweet-onion-salad-dressing.gist: A sweet and tangy onion dressing that adds a burst of flavor to any salad, ready in just 30 minutes!

ingredients: 1 lb carrot, peeled and cut into long thin matchsticks
instructions: Steam the carrot over med low heat until tender crisp, about 5 minutes
Cool and then puree in an electric blender
Set aside
Heat oil over medium high heat
When pan is hot, add carrot puree and cook until the pan gets very dark and starts getting hard
This may take 20 minutes or more if the mixture is very thin
Stir the carrot often until it is quite dark
Stir in salt and sugar
Continue to stir until the halwa turns golden brown
simple-carrot-halwa.title: Simple Carrot Halwa
simple-carrot-halwa.gist: A classic Indian dessert made with grated carrots, ghee, and sugar, offering a rich and indulgent treat.

instructions: In a saucepan, heat milk to boiling point
Stir in the grated carrots, stir until the carrots have dissolved
Add the milk, stirring continuously, to avoid lumps
Cook until the mixture thickens
Stir in the ghee and serve immediately
carrot-ghee-raita-(indian-carrot-ghee-ra.title: Indian Carrot-Ghee Raita
carrot-ghee-raita-(indian-carrot-ghee-ra.gist: A creamy and aromatic raita made with grated carrots and ghee, perfect as a refreshing side dish for any Indian meal.
